bug.author: Shiyunyang-seu
bug.summary: Can not change map in Carla 0.9.9 windows
bug.description: Hi, I want to use the Carla 0.9.9 to make co-simulation with sumo. But, I tried the config.py -m Town04 and also followed the tutorial <denchmark-link:https://carla.readthedocs.io/en/latest/core_map/#changing-the-map>https://carla.readthedocs.io/en/latest/core_map/#changing-the-map</denchmark-link> , but a fatal error both occurs.(said carlaUE4 crashed with something...) The 0.9.5 version is also tested and the map(Town01,02...) can be changed without error. I tested in two different PCs in windows10.

comments.comment: This is strange. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bernatx>@bernatx</denchmark-link> could you have a look?

Hi, This problem was already fixed in 0.9.9.4. It was caused by a workaround about one bug in UE4, that officially released a patch also. In CARLA 0.9.9.4 we removed the workaround and release a patch for the UE 4.24. The patch for UE 4.24 is only needed for Ubuntu machines, related to the Vulkan driver. That would solve your problem.
